Text:
wait a second........it says "french horror thriller" but then the cast consists of Colin Farrell and Keira Knightly and the synopsis sounds like a rom-com??
This doesn't sound like the terrific French Horror Flick I thought it was starring Beatrice Dalle - a bit confusing.  WHICH is it? and surely 448.51MB is a little on the low side????

hey man.
A big mistake.
You just posted the details of the movie
London Boulevard (2010)

ok Sorry For Mistake in Cast and Plot and yes you guys are rite its London Boulevard (2010) Cast and plot details and it happens coz London Boulevard (2010) is my next release so its mixup some temples

it is indeed the excellent french horror flick INSIDE starring Beatrice Dalle........not for the squeamish and definitely not for those looking for a rom-com!
thanks for this!  been waiting for a long time.
